title: Blueprint - Create Mod Hub
tagline: Lead developer for Minecraft Create Mod's future central content hub
description: A modern web platform serving as the central hub for Create Mod content in the Minecraft ecosystem. I built this platform to bring together community-made addons and player-designed schematics in one place, making Create Mod content more discoverable and manageable for the community.
challenges: Integrating multiple data sources (CurseForge and Modrinth APIs)
Building a unified search experience with Meilisearch
Implementing 3D schematic previews for user-uploaded designs
Managing multiple contributing developers with varying experience levels
Creating a consistent UI with Tailwind and Shadcn/UI components
features: Addon discovery with real-time updates and advanced filtering
Schematic sharing platform with 3D preview capabilities
Smart version compatibility filtering across mod ecosystem
Multi-platform support for different mod loaders
Secure OAuth authentication with multiple providers
Responsive design optimized for all device sizes
keyTakeaways: This project significantly developed my project management skills while working with a team. I gained deep experience with TypeScript by extending API models for type consistency, and managed implementation of React 19 features. The integration of multiple data sources and building a unified search experience presented unique challenges that expanded my frontend architecture skills.
